website_summaries.verdict: An easy to use drywall lift that safely lifts drywall panels without the need for extra help.
pros: Reaches up to 11 feet for ceilings and 15 feet for walls
Brake keeps the lift in place along with rubberized feet
cons: Instructions for assembling the lift are just OK

customer_reviews.title: Great product, with new casters and oil!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for the most part. The casters are crap, but bought new ones and now it works great. Also, you need to oil all moving parts!! Otherwise the friction will stress the crank and bend the assembly. I am using it on a commercial drywall project over 7000sqft. and once I performed the mentioned modifications it was excellent. It worked great on walls,12' ceilings, easy to change the height post. On to the next project of building my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Is it amazing? No but it's a decent value for the money. I had to remove the spring on the base to release the locking pin and the winch won't win any awards but it works well enough to save your back.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Dont kill youself,get a lift .you will be glad you did
customer_reviews.text: Works great.I Have been drywalling the inside of my garage with it.By myself I use it for ceiling and upper wall.Im 60 years old would never have been able to do it without it.This makes it easy.Hardest part was lifting those 5/8 thick sheets onto lift.For bottom sheets I use Marshalltown pl589 panel lift.
customer_reviews.author: Nickoli Bearsnaresnic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people complained about the instructions. I can't respond to that because I have never read them. I put it together in about ten minutes without the instructions. If you are struggling with putting this together then maybe you should hire the project done because that is the easy part. I have never used one of these before but they are awesome. No more back breaking dangerous work and I can hang Sheetrock by myself
customer_reviews.author: Julie Morse

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! We used it to hang OSB and also a ladder door in our garage & this hanger was a God's send! Very well constructed, heavy duty. Highly recommend for those heavy projects!
customer_reviews.author: Denita Ross

customer_reviews.title: This product came as promised. Very well made and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product came as promised. Very well made and works flawlessly. I did pick the utube videos by the pros using this machine and it helped alot.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Great Product worked wonders
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoist mainly due to the fact it included an extension allowing it to reach a maximum height of 15 ft. Having a vaulted ceiling with 14 ft to the peak this thing worked a miracle and allow me to hang 4x12 sheets by myself. The installation of the extension was not complicated like of the reviews scared me of but be sure to hang your lower ceilings before installing the extension for taller ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang the drywall on my house's ceiling. The ceiling in the peak is 13.5 feet. This hanger did what it is supposed to do. It saved me several hundreds of dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: finished basement!! could not have done it without the lift..
customer_reviews.author: cbrnurse

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is doing what I needed, but one ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is doing what I needed,but one of the caster wheels doesn't seem to want to swivel which makes it hard to steer sometimes,and when you are cranking the panel up the cable winds over itself and jumps which makes you pause thinking it's coming all apart
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Collins

customer_reviews.title: OK for DoItYourselfer
customer_reviews.text: The unit is not very well manufactured. Hoist is not properly aligned. It worked OK for the remodeling that I am doing on my own home but if I was a drywall professional (which I used to be) this lift would be very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to load and holds the panels safely while maneuvering ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy built hoist that will deliver years of service. It is easy to load and holds the panels safely while maneuvering them into position to attach. It requires moderate mechanical skill to apply longer panels on ceilings without an assistant.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but I have a feeling that this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, but I have a feeling that this is one of those products that is the exact same thing no matter where you buy it and if it is yellow, red, or orange. The extension worked well for the 12ft ceilings in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool was remodeling the house by my self it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tool was remodeling the house by my self it was almost impossible without this drywall supporter to hold for me to hang it..I would recommend this to anyone professional or a DIY home owner..
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: ... this lift with the extension and it really works great. The only fault was putting on the extension ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lift with the extension and it really works great. The only fault was putting on the extension and having to cut the original cable to put on extension.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited to get this! It was my gift to him for our anniversary. It was easy to assemble and to use. I would definitely recommend this to anyone doing remodeling and repairing sheetrock.
customer_reviews.author: Beccy Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for ceiling work
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and use. good mobility on site. Highly recommend for ceiling work
customer_reviews.author: L Garrett

customer_reviews.title: ... for a guy at my work it was the best price for the same product that he swore is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a guy at my work it was the best price for the same product that he swore is the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Hollz13

customer_reviews.title: Yes it does the job. Not as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does the job. Not as well as my expectations. But I am able to hang rock on my own
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, used it often for long sheets of steel on a 13 ft. Ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised - works great. Watch the you-tube videos to learn how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale. Works just as advertised - works great. Watch the you-tube videos to learn how to put it together and use it.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Can't call it a professional lift.
customer_reviews.text: Break will not stay engaged under it's own weight after I hung 1 board, absolutely trash.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great value
customer_reviews.text: very awesome deal !!!! if I needed more of these I would buy from them again ...
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... a ceiling up on our back porch and was pleased with
customer_reviews.text: My husband used it to put a ceiling up on our back porch and was pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: S. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could not have built my house without it!! 6000 square feet of drywall later and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism that holds it closed when moving occasionally lets loose. Otherwise a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: wiconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not made specifically for 12' sheets, but will work for them. Also, you need to remove the cable when putting on the extension and put some kind of a stopper on the end of the cable after you put it on. Not a big deal, I just went to the store and purchased a cable crimping U-bolt for $3 and it worked like a charm. After that, I was able to easily put up drywall sheets on a 15' ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: RclmUrMnd

customer_reviews.title: This product is not for me
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, easier to handle dry wall without the panel hoist
customer_reviews.author: Strath Wood

customer_reviews.title: You hang drywall by yourself!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this product! Several of his friends came by to see it and they were all amazed at the tool and the way the product worked! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Directions
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lift and extension a few months ago. I have used the lift for sid walls and work very well. I also had concern about addding the extension without directions. I found good directions on Northern Tool website. Directions can be downloaded in PDF format.
customer_reviews.author: lancewa123

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back!
customer_reviews.text: Good unit at a good price. Also, safe to use. It is a good home unit, not sure it would last for a professional
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Has some weak spots that are sure to break under ...
customer_reviews.text: Has some weak spots that are sure to break under repeated use. In all fairness, you get what you pay for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back saver
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Makes life easier for one guy working by himself. Even my wife agrees this was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: better than renting
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. For the price, better than renting. Only issue was no instructions for switching to the extension, found the info on U Tube
customer_reviews.author: rono

customer_reviews.title: Its nothing fancy but will get the job done. ...
customer_reviews.text: Its nothing fancy but will get the job done. Buy this instead of renting one and sell it when your finished and get some of your money back. I used it for a 40 x 60 ft. garage ceiling with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the arms are very sloppy...when using anything over 8ft long
customer_reviews.author: Colby Vetter

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend anyone buy this
customer_reviews.text: complete junk. castors do not swivel, always getting stuck. very flimsy and cheap made junk ! I would not recommend anyone buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I am working alone so it would be nearly impossible to do the job without something like this. It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am using this panel hoist to install OSB wall and ceiling panels in my shop. I am working alone so it would be nearly impossible to do the job without something like this. It is easy to use, hoists the panels to the 10' ceiling and walls easily. The three-legged support legs occupy a very large footprint (needed for stability) so it would be best to use in a room without a lot of installed workbenches, etc., but that is what I have, so I am stuck trying to maneuver around all the installed stuff I have. When I am done, I'll sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Eisler

customer_reviews.title: Great value considering renting this would have cost more in ...
customer_reviews.text: Reached 15 foot ceilings. Great value considering renting this would have cost more in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: David Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: Careful on the cable because as you elevate the panel it will slip. The reel needs a 'level wind' device like a bait casting reel. But, without this unit we could not have put up 75 4x10 panels on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Gary N. Wolz
